title: 2019 Divisional Round Weekend Preview
itunes:title: 2019 Divisional Round Weekend Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, and Gregg Rosenthal preview each of the upcoming games of the divisional round starting with the Vikings at 49ers. (6:50) The heroes preview the Vikings heading to face the 49ers and talk about what the Vikings offense would need to do to stop Jimmy G and company before previewing the Titans heading to Baltimore to face the Ravens (22:03). We take a half time break to go over all of the latest coaching news in the NFL (33:33) before previewing the Texans at Chiefs (46:55) . We close the show by previewing the final game of Divisional Round weekend, Seahawks at Packers. (56:23)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
